body:
OK, so it is probably not GC.  Still, it sounds like the channel memory is getting corrupted.  If I had to solve this, I would probably run the program under the debugger, find the address of the length in the channel structure, set a watchpoint on that memory location, and see when it changes.

There are various examples of callbacks in the tree, for example in misc/cgo/test, but they are all fairly trivial.
